name: SAI (catowo)
description:
A short horror game where you play a young girl looking for her parents, she gets lost during a storm and finds herself stuck in a house full in danger.

Solve the puzzles and get her back to her family alive.. if you can.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys to Move

Space to Interact

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTION 

1. Download the game

2. Extract SAI.zip 

3. Run Game.exe

4. Enjoy!

I made this game in 3 days, I basically challenged myself to make a game in a short amount of time. It was actually a really fun.. and quite refreshing after working on a game for 3 months before.

Hope you like it~
